articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: What is ‘Hero Kim Kun Ok’, North Korea's new nuclear submarine to counter US naval power | Mint - Mint
articles.description: North Korea launches nuclear attack submarine to counter US and its Asian allies, says Kim Jong Un.
articles.content: In a bid to counter growing dominance of the US and Asian allies, North Korea launched its new purported nuclear attack submarine, reported North Korea's official Korean Central News Agency on Friday.
